title: [Crash} Game crashes computer following start of game
body:
Hello,

This is my first time submitting one of these reports so please excuse my lack of experience with it.

I am experiencing a complete freezing of my computer that prevents any action (no alt tabbing for example). This occurs at the start of any game featuring full teams and typically freezes at about 2 seconds on the clock when the champions appear to take their places on the map. I have had no history of this happening until a few days ago following the installation of a windows 10 update. I am able to rejoin the match once in progress (if a remake has not been called) but obviously after a full reboot it is difficult to enjoy the game 5 minutes in with no items or experience.

Is there anyone else out there who has faced the same issue and has found a solution?

replies.body:
We've been seeing this behavior for specific setups on Windows 10 after the Anniversary updates went out. It seems the issue can typically be resolved by disabling the new Xbox DVR feature or the game bar entirely with [this guide.](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html)

Let me know if this helped resolve it for you.
I have the same issue and did exactly the same thing. I hope they fix this because it is very irritating.
